modName: A Simple Mod - Summon Spectral Horse
summary: Allows you to buy a spell which lets you summon a spectral horse with a saddle, merchant can be found at Whiterun Stable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][b][u][b][size=4]All my mods are exclusive to Nexus, they will never be uploaded to Bethesda or Steam.
[/size][/b][/u]

01 DESCRIPTION[/b]

You can find the Endros which sells the spell tome at Whiterun Stable.
Spell should cost 1000 gold, but if you use mods like SkyRe the price will change.

The horse should go away after use, so no conjured horse following you if you fast travel, and this one got a saddle, I couldn't find any on the site.

It will work with Convenient Horses, but if you want the horse inventory to work you must set "Inventory Access Mode" to "Absolute"



[b]02 INSTALL[/b]

Just install with NMM.
Or copy the files to DATA folder.



[b]03 LOAD ORDER[/b]

Above Convenient Horses if you use this mod, otherwise it can be loaded anywhere.



[b]04 UNINSTALL[/b]

Uninstall mod with NMM or remove the files from the DATA folder.



[b]05 BUGS[/b]

Please report any bug you find to me on the mod page, I will try to fix as much I can.



[b]06 CONTACT[/b]

Please dont spam me down with private messages.

My Nexus page: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7945765]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7945765[/url]
author: Meatbag101
